segments.text: Yes . And you're Paul , right ? Paul Hill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it's me . And you're Julie Ashley . How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm fine . After ten years , you still look great !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So do you ! How are you doing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not bad . Let's find a table and sit down . We have a lot to talk about .
segments.speaker: S2
